text: Camila Alves is sinking millions of her and husband Matthew McConaughey ’ s fortune into her lifestyle website, ‘ Women of Today ’ – and sources tell RadarOnline. com exclusively Gwyneth Paltrow ’ s feeling “ threatened. ” “ This is a horrible version of Goop as far as [ Gwyneth ] is concerned, and she ’ s steaming mad over it, ” an insider told Radar.
